data.text: @Naveen_kay We regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR so we may check and have your feedback shared with the concerned Airport Team. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@laddernose Mr Ray, we regret the inconvenience and while we are checking on the same, you may also get in touch with our concerned Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi

@raunakam Mr Maheshwari, we appreciate you being a loyal customer and totally understand your frustration. Your feedback is well noted and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@ramkumarmr Sir, we understand your frustration and have noted your feedback to avoid the re-occurrence. Looking forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@mohammadasad07 Mr Asad, we are here to assist and request you to DM us the registered Contact Number and Email ID, so we may have the same shared with our Concerned Team for further review. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@_sirishak12 You're most welcome. 😊 ~Navi
@Varaha_93 Mr Sarma, you can carry a Powerbank of upto 30000 mAh in your Hand Luggage. We hope this helps. ~Navi
@hvgoenka Also, no 47B on IndiGo as of now but we totally get the extent of the imagination. Looking forward to welcoming you both onboard soon. ~TeamIndiGo 2/2

@hvgoenka Mr Goenka, thank you for a good laugh. Big reason why we request our customers to select preferred seats as one might not be this lucky to get an airplane of a distance between the partners 😎. 1/2

@charlarcv Mr Charla, our Airport Team will be there to assist you and we request you to get in touch with them for the same. You may also DM us your PNR to check. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@_sirishak12 Hi, we have replied to your DM and request you to kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@immkkamboj Mr Kamboj, we understand your concern and would like to inform you that Gate Allocation comes under Airport's Authority and the same is subjected to change due to Operational Reasons. We have noted your feedback and hope that you had a comfortable flight with us. ~Navi
@Pinakigowda Hi, please DM us your PNR and an available contact number so we can connect with you and address your concern. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@_hrshx Sir, you can complete your web check-in with the auto seat assignment feature where you do not select any seat and simply skip to the last page. The boarding pass is then sent to the registered email id 12-3 hours prior to the time of scheduled departure. ~Yashica
@adrija_das Ms Das, we are concerned to know this and truly understand your situation here. Please allow us some time to check with the concerned team and we'll connect with you shortly. ~Sheetal

@Kafishman4Ken Mr Fishman, we would like to look into this on priority and request you to DM us your PNR as well as a copy of your PIR (property irregularity report) issued by the arrival airport team so we may assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@wvraman Mr Raman, our team called you thrice, however, the call was disconnected. Please DM us an alternate number along with a good time to connect with you. ~Linda
@parasar_g Yes, Sir. You can carry your 20000 mAh power bank in your hand luggage only. For more details on content carriage/restriction, please refer to https://t.co/fJVKU8uBmd. ~Yashica

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @aaryan_sidh Sir, we understand that flight delays can be challenging and the same was caused due to air traffic clearance. The team does its best to ensure that our passengers reach their destinations without any delays. Hope we make it up to you on the way. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@krishna11291 Sir, could you share the PNR with us over DM along with the id of the customer so we can check and suggest accordingly? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mishravin Mr Mishra, could you please DM us the contact number, we'll connect with you. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@bhavinchhadwa Hi, being on time is what we strive for. However, given the nature of our operation certain unanticipated schedule changes become inevitable & is beyond our control. Further, please DM us your PNR.  ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ccu2dub Hi, infants are not provided seat belts due to safety reasons & are advised to hold the infant on an adult's lap. This is as per safety standards. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@nabomita_smiles Ma’am, while we would never want an on-board medical emergency situation, we're relieved to know that our team members were able to handle it well. We'll surely pass along the praise that they deserve. ~Linda

@Aunu_Gem_in_I Hi, please DM us your PNR along with the full name mentioned on the ID card so we can get this checked. However, if it's left behind in any other premises which is not under purview of the airline you're required to contact the airport authority. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@abbhiinaav Mr Anand, as per our records, INR 3336 was the total booking amount for which GST invoice has been issued. We'd request you to connect with the travel agency for further clarification. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Game_Changer035 Sir, you may carry it in the check-in baggage. However, you may visit https://t.co/0KjChwFhDZ to know more. ~ Sheetal

urls.title: Baggage Information | IndiGo
urls.description: Get all baggage related information like baggage weight, baggage height, what you carry in your baggage before boarding the flight.

data.text: @PhateSagar Sir, we are required to get this checked. Please share the PNR with us via DM so we may update you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SrikanthDyapa23 Sir, for any assistance on this. Please write an email to groups@goindigo.in ~Sheetal

@vnottheaadarguy Hi, please visit https://t.co/HrG4DuSLh4 to make changes to your booking up to 2 hrs prior to the departure. You may let us know via DM if you require any assistance. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @reoncerejo Mr Cerejo, glad to know you've had a pleasant experience. :) Also, we try our best to keep the aircraft insect-free by regularly spraying disinfectants. We are sure that you will understand that entry of insects or flies cannot be completely guarded against. ~Linda

@Vikram7Gusain9 Mr Gusain, your flight schedule is affected due to operational reasons. You may visit https://t.co/nfkSrYBlBt to opt for Plan B where you can change the time and/or date of your flight or cancel the booking and process full refund, at no additional cost. ~Linda

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @NissySagar Hi, our team tried to contact however, was unable to connect. On the second attempt someone else picked up. Please DM us an alternate number along with a suitable time for us to connect with you. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@shambamukherjee Mr Mukhejree, please share your PNR with us via DM, and we'll check and advise accordingly. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@gandhi_nihar Mr Gandhi, since it is a group booking, please write an email to groups@goindigo.in for any assistance. ~Sheetal
@1AllanJennings Sir, our team tried calling you, however, couldn't establish a connection. Please share a convenient time to so we can connect with you. ~Yashica
@parveshgoyal303 Mr Goyal, we understand your concern. However, we'd request you to revert to the same email for further assistance. ~Linda
@RishavRajMaroti Sir, we'll connect with you to assist. ~Shreya
@alok_bhawsinka Mr Bhawsinka, could you please DM us the id and share his PNR with us so we can check and advise? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@omkar123456 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please DM us your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@anmanhas Mr Manhas, we never intend to disrupt any of our customers' travel plans and are glad to know our teammates were able to assist with sweet endings. Your compliments are a welcome delight to our team and we look forward to your pleasant company on-board again soon. ~Yashica
@Edukudaa Sweet endings to a beautiful day! We're glad to welcome you onboard this evening. 😊💙~ Team IndiGo

@intj_vidit Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to share your PNR and the complaint acknowledgment copy (PIR) issued by our customer service team at the arrival airport for us to take a closer look and assist you.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@haja_sheriff Be assured, the same will be done again once your flight lands. In case of any immediate assistance, we request you to reach out to our crew. Looking forward to providing you with a better experience on your next travel with us. ~Sheetal 2/2

@haja_sheriff Sir, we regret the unpleasant experience you had today. We understand that spotting mosquitoes onboard is definitely discomforting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircraft undergo deep cleaning and fumigation before every flight departure. 1/2
@BeastVeeru Sir, we regret to see this. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Ahsan000k Sir, please share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@SPervezM We request you to confirm acceptance, so we may proceed with the same. Please feel free to DM us for further assistance. ~Yashica <2/2>  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@SPervezM Mr Pervez, we regret to learn about your recent experience. While we ensure to deliver the bag in intact condition, this was not intended. However, we're afraid that won't be able to offer otherwise from what has been communicated over the phone. <1/2>
@nebulaekoo Hi, INR 6198 has been refunded. ~Linda

@Chandni87455003 Ma'am, a full refund has been processed from our end to the primary mode of payment on the 16th of November, 2022. We request you to connect with the concerned travel agency for further details on the refund. ~Yashica
@ashu4ubest Hi, we understand the pain of missing the flight. Please allow us some time while we get this checked and update you at the earliest. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Devendr49392445 Sir, please know that web check-in is mandatory. You may carry a soft copy of your boarding pass. Alternatively, you may print the same from the airport kiosk free of cost. Please click on https://t.co/3jwZZevFLp for the details.~Nandita

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @mvghadi27 You may visit the 'Edit Booking' page on our website https://t.co/7UGOtouYYS to check the refund details. ~Shreya

urls.title: Book Domestic & International Flights at Lowest Airfare - IndiGo
urls.description: Online flight booking with IndiGo. Book your domestic & international flight tickets at the lowest airfare with best offers at goIndiGo.in website and app.

data.text: @RajanMe08701105 Mr Mehta, any article left behind in the airport premises are submitted to the airport authority, We'd request you to follow up with Adani lost & found department in order to retrieve the article. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@rajkumarshukla4 Please DM the contact number to connect. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Durga21539 Could you please DM the PNR or seven digits case reference number to check? ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@ramsony4 Sir, we understand your concern. However, your late reporting of you was the only reason our team was unable to accept you for the same flight. Further, our team assisted you with the next available flight at minimal applicable charges. Look forward to your understanding. ~Shreya
@danishmurteza Sir, we regret to see this. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@kartik_es Sir, we regret the trouble. We are getting this checked with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita
@Thamburanmm We've replied to your DM. Please check. ~Shreya
@sujitonly Sir, we'll get this checked and update you at the earliest. Please share your PNR with us via DM. Thanks! ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Ranjy12 Hi, please clear cache & cookies from your web browser history or try an alternate web browser. Let us know via DM if you're still unable to make the booking. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@RahulPr16075283 Mr Prashar, this is unfortunate. However, our Customer Care team tried to assist you to the best of their abilities. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@dgaurav7 Sir, we understand how delays feel like. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope for your understanding on the same. ~Sheetal
@sambarvadaii Sir, we tried to connect with you, however, we could not go through. Could you please help us with your alternate number via DM? ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@chandan1309 Mr Shukla, we have processed a full refund to the travel agency’s account. We request you to please get in touch with them to get the amount transferred in your original mode of payment. ~Linda

@leela_kalyani Ms Kalyani, we are truly concerned to hear this and wish the person gets well soon. Please drop the booking details with us via DM so we may proceed further. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Pprakhar27 Sir, glad to know we could provide you with the best service. We will share your appreciation with the concerned team at the airport. Keep Flying with us!💙 #goIndiGo
@sourabhAil We regret it. Could you please DM the PNR so we may check? ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@pardeepjohal95 Mr Singh, we understand where you're coming from. Please help us with the PNR via DM so we may quickly check and connect with you at the earliest. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@ajietgupta Sir, we believe our Customer Relations team has reverted to your email & also addressed your concern over the call in this regard. You may reply to the same email for further clarification. ~Linda
@CollinSChambers Ms Chambers, we are looking into this on priority, meanwhile, you can use the link below to initiate a DM. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@VirdhaR62725303 Sir, we hope that you all are well now. Please help us with the PNR via DM, we'll be quickly checking this out and get back to you with an update shortly. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@442era Hi, this doesn't seem right. We would like to get it checked and update you, please help us with the PNR via DM. Thanks! ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@D_Simpi Sir, we never wish to disrupt your travel plans. The delay was due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft which disrupted the rotation of the aircraft. We hope you will understand that many factors are beyond our control that determines our flight schedule. ~Sheetal
@chpmech07 Sir, we would like to get this checked. Please allow us some time and we'll get back to you with an update shortly on this. ~Sheetal
@unnisam30 We're glad to know this. Sincere apologies for the trouble. ~Shreya

@BhatiaSailesh baggage sorting area, baggage belt, baggage trolley & aircraft baggage hold. We will share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. We hope to give you a better experience the next time you choose to fly with us. ~Linda (2/2)

@BhatiaSailesh Mr Bhatia, we always to try to deliver passengers' baggage in the same condition as we have received them at the time of check-in. However, such damage can occur during loading & offloading of the baggage at several points like (1/2)

@Vaishali130893 We regret such an experience, however, the check-in counter for a flight closes 75mins prior to the flight departure. As you reported late so our team was unable to accept you on the same flight. We look forward to your understanding. ~Shreya
@Sachins05689887 Mr Sharma, we've responded to your DM. ~Linda
@Anamika93175957 Ma'am, please share some more details with us over DM along with your PNR so we can look into this together. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
#goIndiGo from Bengaluru. Book now https://t.co/rR8I8BTzig https://t.co/LOd1YPRulf
@prabhakar_arao Mr Rao, we see our Customer Relations team has addressed your concern in this regard. ~Linda

@LeoSatyam Sir, we regret the delay today. We understand how it feels to wait for the flight. As checked, the flight is impacted consequentially because of the late arrival of incoming aircraft and the updated time of departure is 1655 hrs. ~Sheetal

@k96144 Hi, that will not cause any problem. However, if you may want to get it rectified, you can DM us the PNR along with the registered email ID so we can make the changes. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@dugargurukul Further, we have taken due note of your feedback. We truly hope to serve you with better service in the future. ~Sheetal 2/2

@dugargurukul Sir, this is not the kind of experience we wish our customers to have. Please know that we are highlighting this with the concerned team right away. Also, please know that the food uplifted onboard is served on the basis of pre-booking. 1/2
@curious_self Ms Goyal, we'd like to look into this at the earliest and request you to DM us your PNR so we can assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@carishabhjain9 Mr Jain, we regret the delay. Please DM your PNR for us to check further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@KanishkaBorkar Sir, we are looking into this immediately and appreciate you bringing this to our notice. We regret the inconvenience caused due to the same. ~Yashica

@wrikkie Mr Jain, that's not what we like to see. We always aim to keep our aircraft clean and well maintained. We request you kindly DM us your PNR so we may pass this on to our cleaning team. ~Linda
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@DrAnsanjoseph Sir, fares are dynamic in nature and may increase or decrease as per the demand and availability. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@DharmeshGauswam Sir, we are concerned to hear this. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@GirishPadhi Sir, this is not the experience we wish to provide. Please share your PNR via DM so we can check and advise. ~Ojasvi
@mohit_vijay Hi, please visit https://t.co/MvCC9vYiXa to check the allowed and restricted items. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @AmitCTweets Mr Chandra, we believe one of our representatives reached out to you via call already and our airport team assisted you with an alternate flight. Further, we have noted your feedback and we hope to provide a more hassle-free experience in the future.~Vaishali
@saagarjiii Mr Kanani, this is unusual. Please know this is not sent from our end and we shall raise the matter with the concerned team. ~Diyashi
@AshishS31605640 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. We have noted your PNR and will raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali
